Application Package

  • Functional Documentation

  • Submodules

The application package contains the main application code. It’s the entry point to the application. It contains the code documentation and the functional documentation of each submodule that belongs to the project.

Functional Documentation

In this part, the user will see the functional documentation of the application package. This documentation must to be added to the __init__.py file of the package (in this case, the __init__.py file that is under the application folder), and it must to be written in reStructuredText format.

Here starts the the content of the __init__.py file. This package contains an application that has a module that generates prime numbers and another module that performs basic arithmetic operations.

Submodules

The application package contains the following submodules.

  • Submodule module1
    • Functional Documentation
      • ArithmeticOperations Class Documentation
        • ArithmeticOperations Class
    • Code Documentation
      • application.module1.arithmetic_operations module
        • ArithmeticOperations
  • application.utils package
    • Submodules
      • application.utils.check_if_number_is_prime module
        • is_prime()
    • Module contents
